Child Parent Security Act (effective 2/15/2021)
description: This law legalized compensated gestational surrogacy in New York and created a statutory framework for establishing legal parentage for children born through assisted reproduction and surrogacy. NYAAFF has been a staunch advocate for the CPSA since it was initially introduced to the legislature nearly a decade ago.
